## General Sub Badge
```{r general-sub-badge}
set.seed(10)
general_sub_data <-
  data.frame(x = seq(1:20))
general_sub_data$y <- 
  general_sub_data$x + 
  runif(n = length(general_sub_data$x),
        max = 5)


ggplot2::ggplot(data = general_sub_data,
                mapping = ggplot2::aes(x = x, 
                                       y = y)) +
  ggplot2::geom_line(color = bold_pal[["Sapphire Blue"]]) +
  ggplot2::theme_classic()
```
